definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

pinyin: ye3 sheng1 dong4 zhi2 wu4 yuan2

sentences.english: Encased at the tip of each 25-foot-long rod are seeds provided by China’s Kunming Institute of Botany.
sentences.chinese: 每个25长的突触顶端嵌有由昆明植物园提供的种子。

sentences.english: The construction and operation of Shanghai Chenshan Botanical Garden is full of characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 上海辰山植物园将特色作为建设和运营的重点之一。

sentences.english: The picture was taken at the Botanical Garden in Erlangen.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片摄于在埃尔兰根植物园。

sentences.english: A wildlife garden is open April to September only.
sentences.chinese: 野生动植物园只在四月至九月开放。

sentences.english: The botanical garden had many different plants and trees, especially cactuses.
sentences.chinese: 植物园里有许多各种植物，尤其是仙人掌居多。

sentences.english: After that, we'll show them around our botanical garden and the school-run factory.
sentences.chinese: 然后，我们要带他们参观我们的植物园和校办工厂。

sentences.english: This article elaborates the four aspects of the characteristics of Shanghai Chenshan Botanical Garden.
sentences.chinese: 就辰山植物园“特色”的四个方面展开评述。

sentences.english: Bronx zoo is fine, Botanical Gardens is great, for males and females.
sentences.chinese: 布朗克斯动物园很棒，植物园也很赞，适合男女参观。

sentences.english: This year, we will spend the Flower Fairy Festival in Wuhan Botanical Garden.
sentences.chinese: 今年的花朝节，我和一行人来到武汉植物园过花朝节。

sentences.english: It passed under the Howrah Bridge and came within sight of the Botanical Garden.
sentences.chinese: 它穿过了霍拉桥的桥底，植物园已经呈现在眼前。

sentences.english: During the National Day holidays, Wuhan Botanical Garden will present amazing plants shows for popular science.
sentences.chinese: 在国庆假期，武汉植物园将推出惊人的植物科普活动。

sentences.english: The lantern of the labyrinth of the Jardin des Plantes is also very ingenious.
sentences.chinese: 植物园的迷宫之灯也是巧妙异常。

sentences.english: The Arboretum covers 180 hectares of green space in theNorthEastnortheast part of Washington.
sentences.chinese: 植物园在华盛顿的东北面覆盖180公倾绿地。

sentences.english: The Singapore Botanic Gardens epitomises the tropical island's luxuriant parks.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡植物园是新加坡这个热带岛屿繁茂的缩影。

sentences.english: This back-light photography of the white lotus flower was at the Botanical Garden in Erlangen.
sentences.chinese: 这种白莲花背光摄影是在埃尔兰根植物园。

definition: Zhongshan Park, the name of numerous parks in China, honoring Sun Yat-sen 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1]

pinyin: Ku4 ken3 huo4 fu1 Gong1 yuan2
